syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Chemistry 9701

learning_objectives.description: describe the types of stereoisomerism shown by complexes, including those associated with bidentate ligands: (a) geometrical (cis/trans) isomerism, e.g. square planar such as [Pt(NH₃)₂Cl₂] and octahedral such as [Co(NH₃)₄(H₂O)₂]²⁺ and [Ni(H₂NCH₂CH₂NH₂)₂(H₂O)₂]²⁺ (b) optical isomerism, e.g. [Ni(H₂NCH₂CH₂NH₂)₃]²⁺ and [Ni(H₂NCH₂CH₂NH₂)₂(H₂O)₂]²⁺
deduce the overall polarity of complexes such as those described in 28.4.1(a) and 28.4.1(b)
